experience.title: Experience
experience.summary: Frontend developer with 3+ years of experience delivering scalable, maintainable web applications. Strong foundation in TypeScript and React, with expertise in modern UI patterns, component-driven development, and responsive design. Comfortable working across diverse frontend stacks, with deep familiarity in ecosystem tools like Redux Toolkit, MUI, and Storybook.

ets-2.title: Software Developer
ets-2.description: Lead software development for the UI Kit project and developed a AI Form Agent as a side project.

1.description: A side project chosen for the yearly performance review. Developed a simple POC with Gemini.

2.description: Lead the development of the B2B UI Kit library, providing reusable React components for Extranet, Intranet, and two additional departmental projects.

ets.title: Junior Software Developer
ets.description: Participated in developing the company's first React-based B2B web applications as part of a legacy modernization initiative. Collaborated with UI/UX designers using Figma and managed tasks in a Jira-driven agile workflow, contributing to multiple projects and documenting processes for knowledge sharing.

1.description: Conceptualized and built the UI Kit project, converting Figma designs into a React component library. Created a CLI tool to allow for individual component imports into existing projects and structured the project as a monorepo using Yarn workspaces.

2.description: Created a standardized email template system integrated with Mandrill, automating deployments via a custom CLI script. Started with 'mjml-react', then switched to 'react-email' to enhance maintainability and usability.

3.description: Maintained and updated legacy Extranet and Intranet applications as part of ongoing modernization efforts.

4.description: Owned the Digital Contract project as sole front-end developer from inception to deployment, enabling resort hotels to manage contract details and documents. Recognized as 'Product of the Month' in Etstur's Monthly Technology Bulletin and provided post-launch support to the new front-end team.

5.description: Developed a reusable B2B React boilerplate, defining technologies, coding standards, and project structure to accelerate new project setups.

6.description: Contributed to the modernization of Etstur's B2B dashboard (etspartners.com), rewriting the frontend in React and integrating with a Java Spring Boot backend. Involved in development, maintenance, and troubleshooting activities except during dedicated work on the Digital Contract project.
